basics.name: Tran Quang Ai
basics.label: Product Manager × Engineer
basics.summary: Product Manager with ~10 years of experience across e-commerce, pharmacy, OTA, hospitality and POD platforms. Product × Engineer mindset, CX/UX obsession, hypothesis-driven and ROI-focused. Currently building AI-powered solutions at NA.AI STUDIO. Passionate about IoT, smart home automation, and optimizing product development processes.

work.name: NA.AI STUDIO
work.summary: Researching and building AI-powered solutions for testing new business models. Developing tools and platforms that leverage AI, automation, and IoT.
responsibilities: Designing and prototyping AI-driven products from concept to MVP
Building automation workflows with n8n, RAG chatbots, and AI APIs
Developing open-source tools for smart home, media processing, and developer productivity
achievements: Built Create Image Studio — AI image generation tool using Gemini API
Developed Just Chat — embeddable RAG chatbot widget connected to n8n backend
Created Mac Audio Remote — native macOS app for controlling audio via iOS Shortcuts (10+ GitHub stars)

work.name: MWG (Mobile World Group)
work.summary: Led product strategy for Bach Hoa Xanh online grocery and An Khang pharmacy digital platforms under Mobile World Group.
responsibilities: Defined product roadmap and prioritized features for online grocery and pharmacy platforms
Collaborated with engineering, design, and business teams to ship features at scale
Analyzed user behavior data to drive product decisions and optimize conversion funnels
achievements: Led digital transformation for Bach Hoa Xanh online operations
Launched key e-pharmacy features for Nha Thuoc An Khang platform

work.name: VinHMS (Vingroup)
work.summary: Owned the Hospitality Management System (CiHMS) product — a comprehensive hotel/resort management platform for Vingroup's hospitality ecosystem.
responsibilities: Managed product backlog and sprint planning for CiHMS platform development
Worked with stakeholders across Vinpearl resorts to gather requirements and validate solutions
Designed CRM, SAP integration, and booking management workflows
achievements: Delivered CiHMS platform serving Vingroup's hospitality chain
Integrated CRM and SAP systems for unified hotel operations

work.name: Tiki
work.summary: Managed seller acquisition and growth features on Tiki Seller Central — Vietnam's leading e-commerce marketplace.
responsibilities: Designed and optimized seller onboarding flows to increase seller acquisition
Built growth tools and analytics dashboards for seller performance management
Collaborated with cross-functional teams to improve seller experience and retention
achievements: Improved seller onboarding conversion through UX optimization
Launched seller growth tools on Tiki Seller Central platform

work.name: BurgerPrints
work.summary: Built the MVP of BurgerPrint — a Print-on-Demand platform enabling sellers to create and sell custom-designed products.
responsibilities: Developed MVP from scratch — product design, architecture, and implementation
Managed the full product lifecycle from ideation to launch
achievements: Successfully launched POD platform serving multiple sellers

projects.name: Smart Home System
projects.description: Complete IoT smart home system built over years — documenting everything from network setup to automation workflows.
highlights: Home Assistant based with custom integrations
Mikrotik network monitoring with Grafana dashboards
Vietnamese news summary automation for HA

projects.name: Mac Audio Remote
projects.description: Native macOS menu bar app for controlling microphone and speaker audio remotely via iOS Shortcuts.
highlights: Built with Swift for native macOS experience

projects.name: Create Image Studio
projects.description: AI image creation studio using Gemini API — a creative tool for generating images with AI through VS Code.

projects.name: Just Chat
projects.description: Embeddable popup chat widget that connects to n8n backend for deploying RAG chatbots on any website.
highlights: n8n backend integration for RAG workflows

projects.name: CLIProxyAPI Dashboard
projects.description: Reporting system integrated into CLIProxyAPI for monitoring usage and setting up data plan limit alerts.

projects.name: Raycast AI Translator
projects.description: Raycast extension for AI-powered translation using proxy API.
highlights: Built with TypeScript for Raycast ecosystem
